About Me
Passionate about web and software development, I enjoy creating web applications and am looking forward to a career of improving my skills and following the latest trends and technologies of the industry.
I am currently located in Japan where I am planning to work and live. As a native english speaker with proficiency in Japanese, I hope to collaborate with people and help produce good quality websites.
Qualifications:
Bachelor Of Computer Science Japanese Proficiency Language Certificate N2
Experience working with:
PHP MySQL Nodejs MongoDB Vue Express Sass JQuery Materialize CSS
